org.agent.slang.data.simple.behavior.bml

Class Speech

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agent.slang.data.simple.behavior.bml.Speech

  • public class Speech
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will provide system to manage Speech element of BML commands. OS Compatibility: Windows and Linux
